name: 3D Rally Racing Hot Drift Driver Dubai Street Drifting Drag Racing Simulator
name_original: 3D Rally Racing Hot Drift Driver Dubai Street Drifting Drag Racing Simulator
description:
Get ready for Racing . As you drive your vehicle around the city dodging various other travellers on the road, stay alert because street racers can suddenly jump on you to contest with you to race you.
The traffic is really dangerous and can get in your way and hit you. Racing is the new fever so choose the cars which suit you and get into the games. The game opponents have drove their car out, now it's your turn. These games are designed to test your abilities and skills in traffic. Your vehicles are really powerful.

Features :

* 3D Environment
* Many Cars to Upgrade
* Realistic Car Physics
* Easy Car Controls

How to play :-

-Tap your iPhone/iPad on left to control steering.
-Touch your iPhone/iPad on right to brake.
-Tilt or use arrows to maneuver the car.
